body_html: Hey Roy, with patches like this, it's really helpful to have a billing of changes. Basically, there's some aspects of the old code you preserved, and some that you did differently. What did you keep? What did you change? This helps orient the code reviewer, and lets them avoid rereviewing code that you didn't change, it was just there from before. (Or, if it's not ready for review yet, that's OK too: just stick WIP on it.)

body: Hey Roy, with patches like this, it's really helpful to have a billing of changes. Basically, there's some aspects of the old code you preserved, and some that you did differently. What did you keep? What did you change? This helps orient the code reviewer, and lets them avoid rereviewing code that you didn't change, it was just there from before. (Or, if it's not ready for review yet, that's OK too: just stick WIP on it.)
